overview: In the not-so-distant future, society has allowed political correctness to go beyond the point of the absurd. For years the Boy Scots have been under the government microscope and finally have been mandated to close their doors for good. Boy Scot, Cliff Elliot, stirs the pot as he tries to cling to the last shreds of patriotism and earn the last Eagle Scout Award.
title: The Last Eagle Scout
